caption.p: Lattice d-spacing variations of Ti 3Sn powder during in-situ cooling and heating process. ( a) D-spacing change of D0 19-(110) plane; ( b) d-spacing change of D0 19-(200) plane; ( c) d-spacing change of D0 19-(201) plane in a temperature range of 93â€“320 K, respectively. The D0 19 (201) peak still existed after phase transformation to the lowest temperature of 93 K.
